2c3a09ab-96c7-46f1-9ebe-a9b275cf1ead.name: Cascading Resource Pools
2c3a09ab-96c7-46f1-9ebe-a9b275cf1ead.formula: count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ResourcePool, attribute=badge|health, depth=5}) - count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ResourcePool, attribute=badge|health, depth=1})
2c3a09ab-96c7-46f1-9ebe-a9b275cf1ead.description: The number of Level 2 or deeper resource pools. Cascading RP increases complexity of both capacity monitoring and performance troubleshooting
